import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../../assets/style.css"; import "./RecordSongs.css"; import SongPlayer from "../SongPlayer/SongPlayer"; import Nav from "../Nav/Nav"; import { getAudioByRecord } from "../../services/AudioService"; class RecordSongs extends Component { state = {}; constructor(props) { super(props); this.firesSong = this.firesSong.bind(this); this.state = { playSong: false, audios: [] }; } componentDidMount(){ const recordId = this.props.match.params.record_id; console.log(recordId); getAudioByRecord(recordId).then((data)=>{ this.setState({audios: data}); }) } firesSong() { this.setState({ playSong: true }); } render() { const name = "http://localhost:5000/api/audio/play/%2fUsers%2fcaiomorais%2fDownloads%2fBob Dylan - Like a Rolling Stone.mp3"; return (
{this.state.playSong ? : null}
Abbey Road
The Beatles
Come Together Lennon/McCartney
Something George Harrinson
Maxwell's Silver Hammer Lennon/McCartney
Octupus's Garden Ringo Starr
Here Comes The Sun George Harrinson
I Want You (She's So Heavy) Lennon/McCartney
); } } export default RecordSongs;
